schema.description: 环境ID，将查询此环境的状态

Message.description: 响应消息，若成功请求为success

ChangeBanner.example: Web+ is updating your deplpoyment environment.

DisconnectedInstances.description: 已断开连接的实例个数

InstanceAppStatus.description: ECS实例中运行的应用的健康状态

UnhealthyInstances.description: 不健康的实例应用个数

UnknownInstances.description: 位置状态的实例应用个数

ApplyingChange.description: 是否正在对环境进行变更

Code.description: 响应代码，若成功请求为OK

403.errorMessage: The specified resource does not exist or it does not belong to this Alibaba Cloud account.

responseDemo: [{"type":"json","example":"{ "Code": "OK", "Message": "success", "RequestId": "3CE38930-5A6A-4F7E-A6AD-DBF0EDE5****", "EnvStatus": { "ChangeBanner": "Web+ is updating your deplpoyment environment.", "LatestChangeId": "wc-5d3bb06a970b3f2e2a87****", "EnvStatus": "RUNNING", "EnvName": "test1", "LastEnvStatus": "INITIALIZING", "EnvId": "we-5d1af9c902470221ab7d****", "AbortingChange": false, "ApplyingChange": false, "InstanceAppStatus": { "HealthyInstances": 0, "StoppedInstances": 0, "UnhealthyInstances": 0, "UnknownInstances": 0 }, "InstanceAgentStatus": { "ConnectedInstances": 0, "DisconnectedInstances": 0 } } }","errorExample":""},{"type":"xml","example":" RUNNING false Web+ is trying to recover your deployment environment wc-5d3bb06a970b3f2e2a87**** INITIALIZING xianbin-test-env we-5d1af9c902470221ab7d**** false 0 0 0 0 0 0 success F1D5FD22-87AC-483A-9310-4F7C6FB6**** OK ","errorExample":""}]
title: 查询给定环境的状态
summary: 调用DescribeAppEnvStatus查询给定环境的状态。
